channel.title: Apprentice Angel on Shooting Star Hill (Remixed by Kayasho) [FUTURE BASS] [Auxy Forum Best Track of 2017]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/kayashokayasho/itorinormxkayasho
I'm back... it's been a while.
This is a Future Bass Arrangement.
Original Songs : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rvtEQycsP5A&app=desktop ＠2013 Konami Digital Entertainment
Please listen if you have time.

item.description:
anon38751485:

I love the chord progression

Me too. I’ve always been a fan of that style of jazz.

Fwiw, watched this a while ago, but I’m still some way off from internalising the thinking.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/FdlyUU5M2dI

item.title: Apprentice Angel on Shooting Star Hill (Remixed by Kayasho) [FUTURE BASS] [Auxy Forum Best Track of 2017]
item.dc:creator: anon38751485
item.description:
hi. thx!

Lead is…
Stress + Fragment.
I wanted to make a slightly different taste.

Bass is Pepper.
I often use Pepper.

I love the chord progression he makes.
My song is inspired by his songs.

but, I still have insufficient training…

Read full topic

item.source: Apprentice Angel on Shooting Star Hill (Remixed by Kayasho) [FUTURE BASS] [Auxy Forum Best Track of 2017]

item.title: Apprentice Angel on Shooting Star Hill (Remixed by Kayasho) [FUTURE BASS] [Auxy Forum Best Track of 2017]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Jesus effing christ!
Incredible production!

Can I ask, what were the bass and lead sounds ~0:20?
Nice, simple, effective (and retro) sound combo.

You’ve got a like, a repost and new SC follower and now I’m off to check out DJ Totto.
(I’m not a fan of the gabba-style beats, but I’m loving those manic, prog-jazz chord progressions and leads.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprentice Angel on Shooting Star Hill (Remixed by Kayasho) [FUTURE BASS] [Auxy Forum Best Track of 2017]
item.dc:creator: LittleSpikes
item.description:
Overall I really love his song!!
I said the track is so amazing as I’ve never experienced such beautiful 2 minutes in my life. And I already can’t get out of looping.
Also I felt the infinite potential of Auxy!

That song is his first song since last update. He put every new effect in the song and I’m really into every single part of it. Such a dramatic come back!

Read full topic

item.title: Apprentice Angel on Shooting Star Hill (Remixed by Kayasho) [FUTURE BASS] [Auxy Forum Best Track of 2017]
item.dc:creator: LittleSpikes
item.description:
めっちゃいいブチ込み感だと思いますw
アプデ後初曲なんですね！鮮やかすぎる再来…。
途中の転調するところとか、音がピュイーーーんって右から左へ頭の中駆け抜けてくところとか、最後のピアノとかもう全部好きです！

Read full topic
